thread.title: BUZZ-UK support services: downgrades still missing despite minimum wage hit
thread.title_full: BUZZ-UK support services: downgrades still missing despite minimum wage hit

title: BUZZ-UK support services: downgrades still missing despite minimum wage hit
text:
703.00 +6.0000 
** Interserve (LSE: IRV.L - news ) target price cut at Liberum after the firm warns of a £10-15 mln hit from new UK minimum wage, with the broker questioning why similar downgrades have not been seen at rival firms 
** Stock fell 4.2 pct on August 12 after warning over impact of new hourly living wage set to reach £9 by 2020 
** Liberum cuts TP to 625p from 655p, says new minimum wage will hit 2016 EPS by 7 pct 
** Adds the co may end up being the first of several outsourcers to warn of the impact to earnings, with Serco and Mitie both cited 
** Serco said in its H1 results cost savings would be offset by inflationary labour costs, but did not update its earnings forecasts. Link: http://bit.ly/1Kru2Rp 
** Mitie to provide trading statement on Tuesday 
** All three cos part of the Stocks Buzz Minimum Wage Basket, expected to lag the FTSE 350 on a longer-term view 
** Other constituents reporting in August: Rank Group (FY Aug 20), Restaurant Group (Other OTC: RSTGY - news ) (H1 Aug 28) 
** Stocks Buzz Minimum Wage Basket - Constituents: http://link.reuters.com/nyc35w Performance: http://link.reuters.com/kyc35w
